relation: For fun you can join an extracurricular activity like dance, basketball, baseball, or tennis. you may even show your school spirit by attending sporting events. If you like to workout for fun, the weight room there is fully functional to attending students.
The cafeteria food is very good. The prices are reasonable as well.
Lehman curriculum isn't that rigorous due to the fact that it is mainly geared to liberal arts education.

Stay focused. It is very easy to fall off track due to the wide variety of extracurricular activities as well as the layout of the campus. many students, in my experience, have fallen into the cutting class phase because some rather hang out on campus rather than go to class. Don't fall into into that pattern.

Lehman College has a beautiful campus with a diverse race of students. Its location in the Bronx makes it east to find. They have a wide variety of sports and many extracurricular activities and club for you to join. Campus is quite quiet filled with studeents who are focused on their studies. Overall a great school.
pageTitle: CUNY Lehman College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {65141=Prospective students should simply visit the Lehman College campus. One would never think to expect how much Lehman College has to offer in terms of academics and extracurricular activities. Hopefully, I will travel to Greece next summer and be a part of an archeology course as an exchange student in July 2013., 192256=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 62582=The cost of a college credit at Lehman College for an undergraduate and matriculated New York resident is $230. My tuition cost for the fall of 2012 is $2,904., 137560=The campus just built and opened in Spring 2013 the new Science Hall building. It is a research facility dedicated to fill the need for American students to advance in science, technology and math. Lectures and labs also take place there. Other locations that are interesting on campus is the APEX gym and the 3 cafeterias on campus that provide a variety of food and also Starbucks at a discounted price. The Apex gym location was also used to house many of the Hurricane Sandy victims. They sheltered those that were unfortunate until they were able to get back on their feet.}

textAfterTable: In three sentences This is a truly beautiful campus that somehow makes you think you are way out of the city. And...only a street away from the #4 Subway and 3 away from the D. It offers such a wide variety of programs and degrees: the arts, sciences, humanities, education, music and even an honor's college. Login to rate or flag the reviews Joann from New York, NY 06/21/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 6 out of 18 people found this review useful. 1 person found it offensive. 4 people found this inaccurate. 2 of 45 Categories Comments Great for these types of students International, Commuting, Adult, Student Leaders, First Year Students(straight from high school, or never attended college etc..) and Disabled. If I missed anyone, I just forgot, it's good for everyone. Tips for prospective students You MUST REACH OUT!!! It is a commuter school and with that there are a many students who put this school third on their list, are transferring from it or too it.
